semantics.label: Paramètres de comportement
semantics.description: Ces options permettent de contrôler le comportement de l'activité.

fields.label: Activer le bouton "Recommencer" ?
fields.description: Cocher cette option si vous souhaitez que l'utilisateur puisse réessayer

fields.label: Pré-remplir les affirmations
fields.description: L'utilisateur commence avec les affirmations déjà ordonnées

fields.label: Autoriser les utilisateurs à ajouter leurs propres affirmations
fields.description: Permet à l'utilisateur d'ajouter ses propres affirmations

fields.label: Afficher les commentaires fournis sous la déclaration
fields.description: Si l'utilisateur a fait un commentaire, celui-ci est affiché dans la liste des affirmations

fields.label: Afficher le résumé
fields.description: Souhaitez-vous que l'utilisateur fournisse un résumé expliquant les raisons de ses réponses

fields.label: Placeholder for the text boxes
fields.default: Type your reasons for such answers

fields.label: Label for the "Continue"-button in the restart dialog
Label for the "Cancel"-button in the restart dialog
Inform the user that data will be lost if he/she continues
fields.default: All the changes will be lost. Are you sure you wish to continue?

fields.label: Text displayed in 'Submit'-button when creating a document
Placeholder for the summary box
fields.default: Give a brief summary in your own words

fields.label: Label when no resources are found
Label when no summary is provided
Description on how to start a drag for screenreaders
fields.default:
Press space bar to start a drag.
When dragging you can use the arrow keys to move the item around and escape to cancel.
Some screen readers may require you to be in focus mode or to use your pass through key

fields.label: Name of the statements column
fields.description: This is the column with the statements you provide

fields.label: Name of the prioritized column
fields.description: This is the column where the statements are put in an order

fields.label: Message read to the screen reader when drag starts
fields.default: You have lifted an item in position :startPosition of :listLength in the :listName list.

fields.label: Message read to the screen reader when drag is moved within the same list
fields.default: You have moved the item from position :startPosition to position :endPosition of :listLength

fields.label: Message read to the screen reader when drag is moved to another list
fields.default: You have moved the item from list :startListName in position :startPosition of :startListLength to list :destinationListName in position :destinationPosition of :destinationListLength

fields.label: Message read to the screen reader when drag is over an area that cannot be dropped on
fields.default: You are currently not dragging over a droppable area

fields.label: Message read to the screen reader when drag starts
fields.default: Movement cancelled. The item has returned to its starting position :startPosition of :listLength in :listName

fields.label: Message read to the screen reader when drag is dropped in the same list
fields.default: You have dropped the item. It has moved from position :startPosition to :endPosition

fields.label: Message read to the screen reader when drag is dropped in a different list
fields.default: You have dropped the item. It has moved from position :startPosition in list :startListName to position :destinationPosition in list :destinationListName

fields.label: Message read to the screen reader when drag is dropped in the same location as before the drag
fields.default: You have dropped the item in the same position as you lifted it. The position is :startPosition in :sourceName

fields.label: Message read to the screen reader before entering the section with the statements
fields.default: To interact with the next section some screen readers require you to be in focus mode
